item.description: We had these at Koneko Cat Cafe in New York City and they were excellent. Apparently it’s a British company and a bit tough to find here in the states, but I was able to find this: https://amzn.
item.content:encoded:
We had these at Koneko Cat Cafe in New York City and they were excellent.

Apparently it’s a British company and a bit tough to find here in the states, but I was able to find this: https://amzn.to/3HfgHCV

item.title: blog
item.description: The reason to maintain a blog is to own your audience, instead of it being leased from another source. Example: moc/YouTube Twitter. An email newsletter can be another way to do that
item.content:encoded: The reason to maintain a blog is to own your audience, instead of it being leased from another source. Example: moc/YouTube Twitter. An email newsletter can be another way to do that

item.title: Generative AI in Healthcare Conversations in Health
item.description: Author: FINN Partners URL: https://vimeo.com/814732622 AI AI in Healthcare “AI will not replace you, but someone who knows how to use AI will” Pre-Eclampsia in pregnancy has been shown to lead to higher risk of heart disease and at an earlier age.
item.content:encoded:
• Author: FINN Partners
  • URL: https://vimeo.com/814732622

AI

AI in Healthcare

“AI will not replace you, but someone who knows how to use AI will”

Pre-Eclampsia in pregnancy has been shown to lead to higher risk of heart disease and at an earlier age. 20:50

item.title: Descript
item.description: Transcription based editing saves me a ton of time. I still love Davinci Resolve for complex edits, but most of my videos these days are done in Descript. https://link.brandonkboswell.com/descript
item.content:encoded:
Transcription based editing saves me a ton of time. I still love Davinci Resolve for complex edits, but most of my videos these days are done in Descript.

https://link.brandonkboswell.com/descript

item.title: Stop reading the news
item.description: From Tim Ferriss in The 4-Hour Workweek. When something important enough happens, people will be talking about it, and you will know. News
item.content:encoded:
From Tim Ferriss in The 4-Hour Workweek.

When something important enough happens, people will be talking about it, and you will know.

News

item.title: coaching is all about asking the right question in the right moment to uncover the path forward for your client
Coaching is less about telling you what to do and more about guiding you back to what you already know through the power of questions
Stop debating what you should make and just make something
Jigsaw Method
item.description: Taken loosely from Ali Abdaal’s conversation with Simon Alexander Ong. My own thoughts: Figuring out your life’s purpose is a bit like putting together a jigsaw puzzle. The more pieces you put together, the clearer it becomes, and the easier it is to do the tougher pieces.
item.content:encoded:
Taken loosely from Ali Abdaal’s conversation with Simon Alexander Ong.

My own thoughts: Figuring out your life’s purpose is a bit like putting together a jigsaw puzzle. The more pieces you put together, the clearer it becomes, and the easier it is to do the tougher pieces. So start with the easy pieces to get the progress started, because it’ll all come together as you go along

item.title: Give a trailer instead of a title when meeting someone
item.description: Titles use people’s past experience with a title to put you in a box. Instead, tell them what you do/enable.
item.content:encoded: Titles use people’s past experience with a title to put you in a box. Instead, tell them what you do/enable.
